meanings: Verb cry and scream, yell in tears
negligence, indifference, 불고하다 disregard, ignore, neglect, take no notice (of), pay no heed[attention] (to)

vlive.korean: 진짜 가지말라고 울고불고..울고불고... I cried and cried for you to stay... 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : [두근두근 가상연애] 메이킹 필름
vlive.english: I cried and cried for you to stay...

vlive.korean: 규태 오빠도 울고불고 난리도 아니었어! Gyutae was balling because of you! 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : [썸남]#최종화 - 이렇게 끝나도 되는거?
vlive.english: Gyutae was balling because of you!

vlive.korean: 맞아요 그때 저희 다 울고 불고 난리 났었죠. That's right. At the time, all of us were crying and going crazy. 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : 오늘의 주재
vlive.english: That's right. At the time, all of us were crying and going crazy.

vlive.korean: 그래~ 어제까지만 해도 울고불고한 선배가 뭔 딴 남자냐? Yeah. She was crying until yesterday, but she has another guy? 듣기 View video 초등학생 관심거리연구소 (Super Cool Kids Lab) : [남자사람친구 14일전]_9화 | 너 나 몰래 바람핀거야?
vlive.english: Yeah. She was crying until yesterday, but she has another guy?

vlive.korean: 진짜 그대로 컸다 - 옛날에 티셔츠 갖고 싶어서 울고 불고 3일 밥 안 먹고... You've grown as you were. - This is the T-shirt I cried my eyes off for 3 days without eating. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 월요일밤 여친과 함께👍
vlive.english: You've grown as you were. - This is the T-shirt I cried my eyes off for 3 days without eating.

examples.korean: Did she cry then? ━Didn't she, just! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그때 그녀가 울던? ━ 울고불고 아주 굉장했어! Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Did she cry then? ━Didn't she, just! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: My son threw a temper tantrum because he wanted to tag along. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아들 녀석이 따라오겠다고 울고불고 난리를 쳤다 Neungyule
examples.english: My son threw a temper tantrum because he wanted to tag along. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: My son makes a scene by crying and asking me to buy him a toy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아들 녀석이 장난감을 사 달라고 울고불고 난리다 Neungyule
examples.english: My son makes a scene by crying and asking me to buy him a toy. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: But the students usually come to my office and cry,' a Seoul middle school teacher said. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그러나 학생들은 대개 교무실로 찾아와 울고불고 사정한다.' 라고 한 중학교 교사가 말했다. Neungyule
examples.english: But the students usually come to my office and cry,' a Seoul middle school teacher said. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: What's all this weeping and wailing about? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 왜 울고불고 난리야? Neungyule
examples.english: What's all this weeping and wailing about? Add to Wordbook
